remarks: The function value of a mapping from the nonnegative integers with four distinct cases for the second case.  (Contributed by AV, 10-Nov-2019.)
statement:
fvmptnn04if.g $e |- G = ( n e. NN0 |-> if ( n = 0 , A , if ( n = S , C , if ( S < n , D , B ) ) ) ) $.
fvmptnn04if.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. NN ) $.
fvmptnn04if.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
fvmptnn04ifb $p |- ( ( ph /\ ( 0 < N /\ N < S ) /\ [_ N / n ]_ B e. V ) -> ( G ` N ) = [_ N / n ]_ B ) $.
$d A n $.
$d N n $.
$d S n $.
$d V n $.
